thread.title: Merrill Builds Out Texas Team With Wells Fargo Brokers
thread.title_full: Merrill Builds Out Texas Team With Wells Fargo Brokers - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Merrill Builds Out Texas Team With Wells Fargo Brokers
text:
A pair of financial advisers who oversaw $270 million in client assets at Wells Fargo Advisors left to bolster a Merrill Lynch team in Austin, Texas.
Advisers Bob Krumholz and Becca Siegel joined Merrill on Monday and merged their practice with an existing Merrill team to form a group that expects to manage $481 million in client assets and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
